Article.Title: A Long Walk Through Startup Alley At Disrupt London
Article.Content: In part 500 of our continuing series featuring some of the most amazing startups on Earth, we present my endless walk through Startup Alley at Disrupt London. Given the terror associated with a large, inebriated man approaching you from all directions with a microphone, I’m pleased to note that everyone at the event was able to pitch with a professionalism that’s rare even in the Valley. Way to go, London! And I hope we get to see you next year! Facebook LinkedIn Startup Alley With John Biggs Part 1 | TC Disrupt: London 2014 Facebook LinkedIn Startup Alley With John Biggs Part 2 | TC Disrupt: London 2014 Facebook LinkedIn Startup Alley With John Biggs Part 3| TC Disrupt: London 2014
